original_title: I Am Legend: Awakening - Story 1: Sacrificing the Few for the Many
overview: This is one of the four "animated comics" taking place in the same universe as the film "I Am Legend".  In the early stages of the KV Pandemic, a refugee camp has been opened somewhere in central America, and is taking in patients infected with Krippin Virus for treatment. As a young boy and girl watch from the outskirts of the camp, a military convoy arrives.
title: Sacrificing the Few for the Many
